name: Run Ninja
description:
Run Ninja is a game I developed myself. AND IT'S FREE!!!!! Exclusively available for Android. I'm using this game as my own personal kick starter to fund future projects. As an indie developer the most challenging thing about creating quality games is resources. You can also help fund those games by supporting our sponsors and clicking on ads. If you donate, ads will be removed from game play for your device. Enough donations from the community will allow for ads to be removed indefinitely from the game for all users. More about how you can help below.



Run Ninja:
Run Ninja is an endless platform runner where you run, collect coins, and avoid spikes. Your objective is collect as many coins as you can, and run as far as you can without dying. How far will you go? Compete against friends using Google Play's Gaming Service

Listing: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

★Features★

  • Run, and collect coins through an endless platform.
  • Obtain and try to beat your highest score by running as far as you can and collecting the most coins.
  • Avoid or smash monsters.
  • Compete with friends to see who can get the highest score and collect the most coins.
  • Many achievements to accomplish.
  • Strive to complete all the achievements in the game.
  • Retro-like graphics with smooth performance in up to 60 FPS.

    • ★This game suggests a donation★

    This is an Indie developed game. As I mentioned before I am using this as a personal kick starter, where proceeds go to help fund future games. I'm very appreciative to those who can donate. You also get a big achievement for donating. Again, donations will also disable ads and enough donations from the community will allow for ads to be removed indefinitely from the game for all users.

    Projects that I'm currently working on that donations help to fund include:
    -A strategy game similar to bejeweled but completely different game play.
    -2 Zelda-like RPG's
    -A side scrolling shooting game.
    -A multiplayer word based game
    -A multiplayer fighting game.


    ★Other ways to help the developer★

    Give us a good rating in the Google Play Store. Please share this game with your friends or co-workers. The more the merrier. If you are on Facebook please share the following post with your Facebook friends.

    https://www.facebook.com/Runninjagame/photos/a.992816207501739.1073741828.992553294194697/992816197501740/?type=3&theater

    Also, be sure to like our page, you will get updates as well as tips and tricks.

    https://www.facebook.com/Runninjagame/

    Feel free to leave comments if you run into any errors, or have suggestions for games you would like to see. I am very open to suggestions. Thank you so much!
